text_block_list.name: Orfe's Vassal A
text_block_list.text:
——Orfevre-sama. All of your vassals have 
finished uploading. Please tell us what you'd like.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Good Work.

text_block_list.name: Orfe's Vassal B
text_block_list.text: Y-you're……! What are you shouting for? It's rude!

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
It's fine. 
………it's a reward for the training earlier. I'll listen for now.
choice_data_list: I want to show you my strength……!
I want to show you my strength……!

text_block_list.text:
……She had said it. 『You do not have the qualifications』 
That 『If it's just admiration, then anyone can do it』

Then, all I had to do was prove it. That I was better than before. 
That it wasn't just admiration. That I had value, and resolve.
choice_data_list: Even without a contract, I'll still do it!
Even without a contract, I'll still do it!

text_block_list.text:
I understood that the relationship between trainer 
and trainee was special. ……But I still wanted 
to show that I had value to the "King".

Until then, no matter how painful it became, I would continue on. 
In the same way you would mark the strongest racers——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ……Very well.

text_block_list.name: Orfe's Vassal A
text_block_list.text:
A-are you okay with that? Unlike us, 
this person is one of the Academy's trainers……

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
What kind of "King" would mind something so trivial? 
……toil away as much you like.

In this way, I would be able to prove myself 
to Orfevre not as a trainer, but as a person——

text_block_list.name: Orfe's Vassal A
text_block_list.text:
With this, everything planned for today has been completed. 
Thank you for your hard work.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Umu. Good work. 
——Everyone, continue to work hard tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ——Alright, we're heading to the next store.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
——About that last race. 
Tell me your impressions.

……gradually, the number of days I would be 
by her side assisting her was increasing——
————That continued for some time.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
————Yes. 
This ochazuke is quite tasty, isn't it, Or?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ……Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san. Thank you for taking the trouble to accompany us. 
Thanks to you, it was a very pleasant time.
choice_data_list: I'm just doing this because I want to
I'm just doing this because I want to

text_block_list.text:
Today I was accompanying Orfevre and her sister 
to several famous ochazuke shops in Niigata.

Lately, it feels like I've been accompanying 
them on more and more outings like this……
choice_data_list: Feel free to take your time
Feel free to take your time

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Oh. Does that mean you've already made arrangements for us? 
……How thoughtful of you.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
————Once we return to the Academy, 
be prepared to prove yourself as a trainer.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Your "gratitude" has already been sufficiently demonstrated. 
If you wish to move forward, it will be in a new way.

I understood because we had spent so much time together. 
Orfevre had gained faith in me and was offering me a chance.

The time had come. I had stuck with her through so much, and 
before I knew it, it had become time to show my true worth——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ……Now then, show me.

I offered a document to Orfevre. 
It was everything she would need on her path to becoming "King".

Not as a vassal. Admiration, but not as a servant. 
To stand beside the "King" as a trainer——
choice_data_list: I will aim for the top as a trainer!!

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Oh——

……On that first day I met Orfevre, 
I received a hint towards my worth as a trainer.

At that time, she asked 
『You came to the racing world only out of admiration?』

Now I could say it. 『No』. My dream is here too. 
The dream of being there as the "King" ascended. And to do that——

I would also become someone to leave my mark on the racing world. 
To surpass the legends of the past, obtaining a radiance greater 
than the Triple Crown……A "King's" Triple Crown.
choice_data_list: ————And we'll stand at the top together!
————And we'll stand at the top together!

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ————………Hold out your right hand.

As ordered, I held out my right hand to Orfevre. 
At that moment——

Orfevre kicked at my hand. 
The resulting wind pressure slammed in to my right hand……!!

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
……Accept this. A tailwind from the one who will use your dream 
as sustenance to become "King". It will become my strength.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Engrave this feeling in to your soul, and strive forth. 
————To stand at my side.

There was a lingering pain carved in to my right hand. 
Together with that, I followed after the "King"

——I didn't need to ask where we were going. The road she was 
taking, was the one I was too……the path to ascendancy.
